channel.title: Comments on: Weblogs.com and Weblogs, Inc. Sold

item.title: By: nouvelles
item.dc:creator: nouvelles
item.description: To your question "What does AOL see in Weblogs, Inc?" I would like to answer, the RSS propagation within communities. And Verisign bought from Dave a regular updater of RSS enabled blog post titles what will offer them even more information, wouldn't it?
item.content:encoded: To your question “What does AOL see in Weblogs, Inc?” I would like to answer, the RSS propagation within communities. And Verisign bought from Dave a regular updater of RSS enabled blog post titles what will offer them even more information, wouldn’t it?
